description: uni queries the Unicode database from the commandline. It supports Unicode 15.1 (September 2023) and has good support for emojis.
displayName: uni: Unicode database command-line query tool
summary: uni queries the Unicode database from the commandline. It supports Unicode 15.1 (September 2023) and has good support for emojis.
author: Martin Tournoij (arp242),  et al.
